title: The Font Bureau, Inc. releases Truth FB and Minha
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119125257/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 18.Aug.2005 2.36pm 

—  
Anyone who hasn’t been to [The Font Bureau, Inc](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119125257/http:/www.fontbureau.com/) recently might have missed their two newest additions, [Truth FB](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119125257/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/TruthFB) designed by David Berlow and [Minha](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119125257/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Minah) designed by Jacqueline Sakwa.

—  
**Truth** was originally available only on Apple Computers and even then only in 1 weight under the name of Charcoal. Now that the handcuffs are off, David has taken the typeface on a little journey and added seven weights for us. The idea of using what was once a “computer font” for anything else is now being questioned and I personally look forward to how people will use it.

—  
**Minah** is a friendly, elegant, and feminine calligraphic sans with a small body and long limbs. While it is available in 4 weights, the details that make is so original are maintained throughout.
author: Miss Tiffany
